response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by both myself and you, ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. Considering its quality and the value it brings, I kindly propose an offer of $14,500 for this product. I trust this price reflects a fair compromise while allowing us to reach a successful agreement. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14500}
